      • getClaims

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.auth0.jwt.interfaces.Claim> getClaims​()
        Gets the claims for this JWT token.
        For an ID token, claims represent user profile information such as the user's name, profile, picture, etc.
        Returns:
        a Map containing the claims of the token.
        See Also:
        ID Token Documentation
